location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:70 x 96 mmCondition:The image is in good condition.Foliation:'a'; '15'Process:Silver gelatin print

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject Matter:View in Linga [Lingeh] in the harbour. A large group stands on the quay walls at left. Several boats are moored in the background at right. At least six wind towers ( badghirs) can be seen rising above the low-lying buildings along the quay from left to right.Inscriptions:Lower left, below image, in pen: ‘Linga’Lower left, below image, at right: ‘Boat Basin & "Badghirs"'Upper left, above image, in pencil, crossed-out: ‘a’Lower right, alongside image, in pencil: ‘15’Lower right, below image, in pen: ‘(Jan. 1918)’
